name: Wizard in the Woods
description:
Apologies for no sound, I haven't figured out how to get music to work in GB Studio.

Journey into the woods, as Ollie the wizard as he wishes to escape his auntie potion shop. Help the villagers, and the spirit of the staff.

My first proper game, made in GB studio.
Based on loosely on my book "Wizard with a Wish".

Let me know if you spot any errors, spelling, etc.
